author: jochembrouwer
content:
Hiya, I got a question about the internals of Geth's VerifyRangeProof of Trie.

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/d10c28030944d1c32febba3f45ae8c175ab34063/trie/proof.go#L516

I am a bit confused by this case. What if I do a `GetAccountRange` request and the other node responds with only one key/value pair. I have requested left key X and right key Y. How do I know that whatever key Z gets reported, there are no trie items between X and Z? This is not included in the proof (right?). The only case I could see this work failsafe is when X === Y? (Or is there some internal conversion within the devp2p layer?) Thanks ðŸ™‚
